languages.text: [Уничтожить алтарь] "Священный огонь орбитальных пушек моего корабля сравняет дворец с землей раньше, чем проклятый артефакт успеет совратить еще хоть одну душу".
[Destroy the altar] "The sacred fire of my ship's orbital cannons will raze the palace to the ground before this cursed artefact can corrupt another soul."
languages.original_text: [Уничтожить алтарь] "Священный огонь орбитальных пушек моего корабля сравняет дворец с землей раньше, чем проклятый артефакт успеет совратить еще хоть одну душу".

traits.locale_text: [Destroy the altar] "The sacred fire of my ship's orbital cannons will raze the palace to the ground before this cursed artefact can corrupt another soul."

[Destroy the altar] "The sacred fire of my ship's orbital cannons will raze the palace to the ground before this cursed artefact can corrupt another soul."

languages.text: [Den Altar zerstören] "Das heilige Feuer der Orbitalkanonen meines Schiffs wird den Palast dem Erdboden gleichmachen, bevor dieses verfluchte Artefakt noch eine weitere Seele verderben kann."
languages.original_text: [Destroy the altar] "The sacred fire of my ship's orbital cannons will raze the palace to the ground before this cursed artefact can corrupt another soul."

traits.locale_text: [Den Altar zerstören] "Das heilige Feuer der Orbitalkanonen meines Schiffs wird den Palast dem Erdboden gleichmachen, bevor dieses verfluchte Artefakt noch eine weitere Seele verderben kann."

languages.text: [Détruire l'autel] « Le feu sacré de mes canons orbitaux va raser entièrement ce palais avant que cet artefact maudit ne puisse corrompre une autre âme. »
languages.original_text: [Destroy the altar] "The sacred fire of my ship's orbital cannons will raze the palace to the ground before this cursed artefact can corrupt another soul."

traits.locale_text: [Détruire l'autel] « Le feu sacré de mes canons orbitaux va raser entièrement ce palais avant que cet artefact maudit ne puisse corrompre une autre âme. »

languages.text: [摧毁祭坛]“让我的飞船发射轨道炮，让神圣的烈焰把这座宫殿夷为平地，决不能让这件诅咒造物继续腐化其他人的灵魂。”
languages.original_text: [Destroy the altar] "The sacred fire of my ship's orbital cannons will raze the palace to the ground before this cursed artefact can corrupt another soul."

traits.locale_text: [摧毁祭坛]“让我的飞船发射轨道炮，让神圣的烈焰把这座宫殿夷为平地，决不能让这件诅咒造物继续腐化其他人的灵魂。”

languages.text: [Destruir el altar] «El fuego sagrado de los cañones orbitales de mi nave arrasará el palacio antes de que este artefacto maldito corrompa otra alma».
languages.original_text: [Destroy the altar] "The sacred fire of my ship's orbital cannons will raze the palace to the ground before this cursed artefact can corrupt another soul."

traits.locale_text: [Destruir el altar] «El fuego sagrado de los cañones orbitales de mi nave arrasará el palacio antes de que este artefacto maldito corrompa otra alma».

languages.text: [祭壇を破壊する]「{mf|俺|私}の船の軌道キャノンが聖なる火をもって宮殿を完全に破壊するだろう。この呪われたアーティファクトが、これ以上誰かの魂を蝕む前にな」
languages.original_text: [Destroy the altar] "The sacred fire of my ship's orbital cannons will raze the palace to the ground before this cursed artefact can corrupt another soul."

traits.locale_text: [祭壇を破壊する]「{mf|俺|私}の船の軌道キャノンが聖なる火をもって宮殿を完全に破壊するだろう。この呪われたアーティファクトが、これ以上誰かの魂を蝕む前にな」

languages.text: [Sunağı imha et] "Gemimin yörünge topları, bu lanetli eserin başka bir ruhu daha yozlaştırmasına mahal vermeden sarayı yerle bir edecek."
languages.original_text: [Destroy the altar] "The sacred fire of my ship's orbital cannons will raze the palace to the ground before this cursed artefact can corrupt another soul."
